page.title: 10RECREATION continued
page.content:
The Amenity Area was built by Clyst Hydon Parish Council in May 1981.The river Clyst runs next to the Amenity Area.There are two trees in the Amenity Area and a bush.There are two benches both made out of wood.There are two plaques for the best kept village next to the trees.A wooden fence surrounds the Amenity Area.The grass in the Amenity Area is cut every two months.
There are 3 buses and 2 mini buses that travel through Clyst Hydon.They come every day apart from Sunday.On Thursdays and Fridays they only come in the afternoon.Sometimes the buses make small trips like from the Merry Harriers to the bus stop which is near the Amenity Area.
